benchmark_details.name: CSVQA (Chinese STEM Visual Question Answering)
benchmark_details.overview: CSVQA is a diagnostic multimodal benchmark specifically designed for evaluating scientific reasoning through domain-grounded visual question answering, featuring 1,378 carefully constructed question-answer pairs across diverse STEM disciplines.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To rigorously evaluate the scientific reasoning capabilities of vision-language models (VLMs) in interpreting STEM content.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: The benchmark currently focuses on high school-level content, which may not fully capture the depth and complexity of advanced scientific reasoning.

data.source: Publicly available Chinese high school textbooks and examination papers across STEM disciplines.
data.annotation: Expert-annotated questions, with about 81% paired with detailed explanations.

methodology.calculation: Evaluation of model responses based on correctness and reasoning consistency.
methodology.interpretation: A valid response is one that is logically consistent with provided explanations.
methodology.validation: Validated through expert reviews and quality control pipelines.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: All content used in the dataset is sourced from publicly available materials, ensuring no private information is included.
ethical_and_legal_considerations.data_licensing: Content sourced with explicit permission for use and redistribution.
ethical_and_legal_considerations.compliance_with_regulations: Developed in accordance with established ethical standards.
